pages.text: Avaru (atithigalu) helidaru; ‘‘hageye aguvudu. (Hagendu) nim'ma odeyanu heliruvanu. Avanu khandita yuktivantanu jnaniyu agiruvanu’’
avaru (ibrahim) kelidaru; dutare, nim'ma guri enu
avaru (malak‌galu) helidaru; ‘‘ondu aparadhi janangadedege nam'mannu kalisalagide’’
‘‘avara mele mannina kallugalannu surisabekendu namage adesisalagide’’
‘‘nim'ma odeyana bali avugalannu (a kallugalannu), atireka esaguvavarigende gurutisidalagide’’
konege navu, allidda visvasigalannu horategedevu
alli (a nadinalli) navu muslimara ondu maneyannu matra kandevu
mattu kathina sikseyannu anjuvavarigagi alli navu ondu pathadayaka sucaneyannu bittiruvevu
mattu musarallu (pathavide). Avarannu navu spastavada adharadondige phir‌aunana kadege kalisidaga
avanu (phir‌aunanu) tanna saktiya gunginalli bandayaveddanu mattu (musarannu) jadugara hagu huccanendu karedanu
navu avanannu avana padegalannu hididevu hagu avarannu kadalige esedu bittevu. Avanu nindanege ar'hanagiddanu
mattu ad janangadallu (pathavide). Navu avara mele ondu maraka candamarutavannu heridevu
adu tanneduru banda pratiyondu vastuvannu koleta muleyantagisi biduttittu
mattu samud janangadallu (pathavide). Ondu nirdista avadhiya tanaka sukha anubhavisiri endu avarodane helaladaga
avaru tam'ma odeyana adesadeduru bandayaveddaru. Konege, avaru noduttiddanteye sidilondu avara meleragitu
konege avaru eddu nillalikku asaktaradaru mattu pratikaravesagalikku asamartharadaru
avariginta hindina nuhara janangadallu (pathavide). Avaru avidheyaragiddaru
navu akasavannu kaiyare nirmisiruvevu. Navu khandita visala samarthya ullavaragiruvevu
Mattu bhumiyannu navu hasinantagisiruvevu. Navantu atyuttamavagi hasuvavaragiruvevu
navu pratiyondu vastuvinindalu eradu bagegalannu (jotegalannu) srstisiruvevu. Nivu patha kaliyabekendu
nivu allahanedege dhavisiri. Nanu avana kadeyinda nim'mannu spastavagi eccarisuvavanagiddene
